articles.author: David Goldman, Matt Egan
articles.title: Trump slashes tariffs on India after Modi agrees to stop buying Russian oil - CNN
articles.description: President Donald Trump on Monday announced he would reduce tariffs on Indian goods in exchange for, among other things, a promise to stop buying Russian oil.
articles.content:
President Donald Trump on Monday announced he would reduce tariffs on Indian goods in exchange for, among other things, a promise to stop buying Russian oil.
That will be a tall task: India has been… [+6302 chars]
